name: My hot beach vacation
description:
My hot beach vacation tells the story of a salary man and your friends
that goes to a hot beach in a summer vacation. Gameplay is a Match 3 classic that allows the player to take off their clothes and visit hot scenes with the characters involved.

FEATURES
-Different womans to Undress
-Summer Vacation Theme
-Can Undress



Relax and Enjoy.
Try to get high Scores and be happy!

All characters are over the age of 18.
